price: 当时，城里有九伙人，在地方上伤风败俗，而不移风易俗，
arabic: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wakāna fī al-madīnati tis'ʿatu rahṭin yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
